solution

Class Memoizer<T,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • solution.Memoizer<T,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Input type
    R - Output/Result type

    public final class Memoizer<T,R>
extends java.lang.Object
    Questions 1b of the code test

    1b - Write a function called memoize that takes any other function as input and returns a memoized version of that function

    Generic Class to facilitate external memoization of functions. This involves caching previously computed results in a data structure and return the chached result when the same computation is needed again

    Author:
    Stephen Luchacha

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T,R> java.util.function.Function<T,R> memoize(java.util.function.Function<T,R> fn)
      Call to memoize a function that has a single argument.
      static <T1,T2,R> java.util.function.BiFunction<T1,T2,R> memoizeBi(java.util.function.BiFunction<T1,T2,R> biFn)
      Call to memoize a function that has two arguments
      Included this to show that the memoize function can be used by another function particularly one with different no of arguments

        public static final <T,R> java.util.function.Function<T,R> memoize(java.util.function.Function<T,R> fn)
